Title: Director, Data Center Construction- APAC
Salary:
Director,
Data Center Construction- APAC

Meta is seeking an experienced Director to join our DataCenter Engineering & Construction Team. Our data centers are the foundation upon which our rapidly scaling infrastructure efficiently operates and upon which our innovative services are delivered. Building, operating and retrofitting data centers the "right" way is synonymous with ensuring high uptime, capacity availability and capital conservation. The Datacenter Engineering and Construction (DEC) team thinks from chip to chiller (or electrical substation), determining configurations and ensuring maximum efficiency of our compute infrastructure, and the DEC Delivery team is committed to continual optimization of the delivery process at each level.   

The DEC Delivery organization and its sub teams operate in a matrix team structure and the Director will have the Data Center Delivery responsibility within our APAC Region for new build and retrofit construction project success (to include all data cabling infrastructure), GC and trade partner relationships and team member development.  Further, the Director will work with cross functional partners to foster governmental agency and owner furnished equipment vendor collaboration and relationships, as well as relationship management with key cross functional operational partners (Facilities Operations, Edge Network Services and Facilities Engineering to name a few) across the region in a culture of collaboration, safety and quality unparalleled in the datacenter construction industry.  

The Director is responsible for $1M- $4B project sizes managing a team of 6 - 8 direct reports (flexible based on demand) and leading a team of matrixed Safety, QAQC and Project Controls (Cost + Schedule) professionals at site toward predictable outcomes.
